s.text: With due respect and humility I write you this letter which I believe you would be of great assistance to me.I am Ms Merian Ade, I want you to help me invest my money into a profitable business in your Country as my partner.

With due respect and humility I write you this letter which I believe you would be of great assistance to me.I am Ms Merian Ade, I want you to help me invest my money into a profitable business in your Country as my partner.
I will give you full details of the funds concerning the transfer as soon as I receive your response.
this money is $6.5million united states Dollars only I will give you full details once you reply my message.
